languages.text:
В начале боя накладывает на владельца стаки огненной защиты в количестве 2*ПсиРейтинг владельца.
Так же дает иммунитет к Горению и ВарпГорению.

traits.locale_text:
В начале боя накладывает на владельца стаки огненной защиты в количестве 2*ПсиРейтинг владельца.
Так же дает иммунитет к Горению и ВарпГорению.

languages.text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале боя капитан получает <u>(2 × пси-рейтинг)</u> уровней огненного барьера и иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy-rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

languages.text: Kaptan, çatışmanın başlangıcında +<u>(2 × ruhsezi derecesi)</u> kadar ateş bariyeri birikimi kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} karşı bağışık hâle gelir.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kaptan, çatışmanın başlangıcında +<u>(2 × ruhsezi derecesi)</u> kadar ateş bariyeri birikimi kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} karşı bağışık hâle gelir.

languages.text: Al comienzo del combate, el capitán gana +<u>(2 × factor psíquico)</u> acumulaciones de barrera de fuego y se vuelve inmune al efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del combate, el capitán gana +<u>(2 × factor psíquico)</u> acumulaciones de barrera de fuego y se vuelve inmune al efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}.

languages.text: 战斗开始时，萨戈纳舰长获得<u>（2×灵能等级）</u>层“烈焰屏障”层数，且对{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果免疫。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战斗开始时，萨戈纳舰长获得<u>（2×灵能等级）</u>层“烈焰屏障”层数，且对{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果免疫。

languages.text: Au début du combat, le capitaine gagne +<u>(2 × indice psy)</u> cumuls de Barrière de feu et bénéficie d'une immunité contre l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début du combat, le capitaine gagne +<u>(2 × indice psy)</u> cumuls de Barrière de feu et bénéficie d'une immunité contre l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時、キャプテンは+<u>（2×超能力レート）</u>スタックの炎のバリアを付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}火傷{/g}に耐性を持つようになる。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時、キャプテンは+<u>（2×超能力レート）</u>スタックの炎のバリアを付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}火傷{/g}に耐性を持つようになる。

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Kapitän +<u>(2 × Psi-Wert)</u> Feuerbarriere-Stapel und ist immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the captain gains +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> fire barrier stacks and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Kapitän +<u>(2 × Psi-Wert)</u> Feuerbarriere-Stapel und ist immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}.
